options.name: Gunagr's Armour
options.description: The bearer gains Fearless and can never be wounded on better than 4+.

options.name: Raven Banner
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Battle Focus, Fearless, and Frenzy.

options.name: Byargfylli
options.description: Attacks made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks, and gain Lethal Strike and Lightning Reflexes.

options.name: Eyratöki
options.description: The wielder gains Crush Attack, and can perform two Crush Attacks instead of one (provided it declared the use of its Crush Attack at the end of step 4 of the Round of Combat Sequence as usual).

options.name: Symbol of Slaughter
options.description: Attacks with this weapon become Magical Attacks. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and +2 Agility. Close Combat Attacks made against the wielder's model gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Harp of Bragi
options.description: The range of the bearer's Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag is always 18".

options.name: Norn's Bones
options.description: The Wizard can select its spells from all the Learned Spells of its chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. This rule overrides the Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Apprentice or Adept.
